QuestData.Title: Princess Must Die!
QuestData.Description: The Brackwells have a prize-winning pig, Princess. The sow is HUGE, and she got that way from sneaking over here and eating my veggies!$B$BIt just so happens that she's here now! Princess must die! Bring me her collar as proof of the deed and I'll give you something for your time!$B$BYou'll find Princess smack dab in the middle of our watermelon patch. Get her!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Princess, grab her collar, then bring it back to Ma Stonefield at the Stonefield Farm.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you see her yet? Did you get her?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank goodness! That pig was getting so big she'd have eaten our whole crop! Thank you, $n.$B$BNow, do any of these suit you?
